nodes.buffDesc: • Increases Agent Physical Anomaly Buildup Rate by 20%, and Assault DMG by 80%.
• Increases Agent Electric Anomaly Buildup Rate by 20%, and Shock DMG by 80%.
• Increases Agent Ether Anomaly Buildup Rate by 20%, and Corruption DMG by 80%.
• Increases Agent Fire Anomaly Buildup Rate by 20%, and Burn DMG by 80%.
• Increases Agent Ice Anomaly Buildup Rate by 20%, and Shatter DMG by 80%.
• Increases Chain Attack DMG by 100%. Upon launching a Chain Attack, all squad members deal 10% more DMG for 30s, stacking up to 3 times. Each stack's duration is calculated separately.
• Increases Daze inflicted by Defensive Assists by 100%, and Assist Follow-Up DMG by 150%. Upon launching a Chain Attack, gain 1 extra Assist Point.
• Increases Agent Impact by 50%. Upon hitting Stunned enemies, increases the target's Stun DMG Multiplier by 75%.
• Agent Decibel Generation Rate increases by 50%. Increases Ultimate DMG by 120%.
• Increases Agent Anomaly Buildup Rate by 25%, and Attribute Anomaly DMG by 80%.
• Defensive Assist's Daze increases by 100%. Assist Follow-Up's DMG increases by 100%.
• Dodge Counter DMG increases by 150%.
• When launching EX Special Attacks, Agent DMG increases by 35% and DMG received is reduced by 25% for 15s.
• Increases Agent Impact by 30%. Slows down Daze recovery for Stunned enemies by 20%.
• When launching Perfect Assists, Agent DMG increases by 35% and DMG received is reduced by 25% for 15s.
• Increases Agent Anomaly Buildup Rate by 30%. Enemies afflicted with Attribute Anomaly deal 25% less DMG for 10s.
• When triggering a Perfect Dodge, Agent DMG increases by 10% and DMG received is reduced by 10% for 10s, stacking up to 3 times. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

• When triggering a Perfect Dodge or Perfect Assist, Agent DMG increases by 40%, and they slowly recover 5% of their HP for 5s.
• If an agent is hit while the above buffs are active, the DMG boost and HP recovery effects will be interrupted.
• Defensive Assist's Daze increases by 100%. Assist Follow-Up's DMG increases by 100%.
• Dodge Counter DMG increases by 150%.
• When launching Perfect Assists, Agent DMG increases by 35% and DMG received is reduced by 25% for 15s.
• When triggering a Perfect Dodge, Agent DMG increases by 10% and DMG received is reduced by 10% for 10s, stacking up to 3 times. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.
• Increases Agent Anomaly Buildup Rate by 30%. Enemies afflicted with Attribute Anomaly deal 25% less DMG for 10s.

1.0.1.buffDesc:
• When there are normal enemies on the battlefield, Agents deal 25% less DMG to elite and boss enemies and 50% more DMG to normal enemies.
• Agent Ice DMG and Ether DMG increase by 20%. Basic Attack and Dash Attack DMG increase by 50%.

1.0.2.buffDesc:
• Agents deal 20% less DMG and 50% more Daze to non-Stunned enemies. Enemies are Stunned for 20% longer.
• Agent Ice DMG and Ether DMG increases by 20%.

1.1.1.buffDesc:
• Basic Attacks deal 15% increased Daze, and Chain Attack DMG increases by 100%.
• Agents additionally deal 50% increased DMG to Stunned enemies.

1.1.2.buffDesc:
• When an enemy is Stunned, all squad members gain 2 stacks of Fervor, and when an Attribute Anomaly is triggered, all squad members gain 1 stack of Fervor. Fervor lasts for 20s and stacks up to 3 times. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.
• For each stack of Fervor, Agent ATK increases by 10% and Anomaly Proficiency increases by 10.

1.1.3.buffDesc: • Increases Agent ATK by 20%, and Attribute Anomaly DMG by 30%.

1.2.1.buffDesc:
• Increases Agent ATK by 20% and DMG taken by 20%.
• Obtaining a Shield grants all squad members 10 Energy, and an additional 20% ATK, lasting 20s. Can be triggered once every 20s.

1.2.2.buffDesc:
• While Shielded, Agent Anomaly Buildup Rate is increased by 25%.
• Agents deal 35% more DMG to enemies that are suffering an Attribute Anomaly.

1.2.3.buffDesc:
• Agent DMG is increased by 25%.
• When inflicting Burn or Shock on enemies, Agent ATK increases by 20% for 15s. When the effect is triggered, the enemy immediately gains 20% Daze if the enemy is not Stunned.

1.3.1.buffDesc:
• Assist Attack, EX Special Attack, and Ultimate Anomaly Buildup increases by 30% and DMG increases by 20%.
• When triggering Disorder, generate 400 Decibels, and reduce the target's DEF by 20% for 20s. The Decibel gain effect can trigger once every 10s.

1.3.2.buffDesc:
• Agent Impact increases by 20%. Upon Stunning an enemy, all squad members recover 20 Energy and have their ATK increased by 20% for 20s. This Energy gain effect can trigger once every 15s.
• Upon Stunning an enemy, its Stun DMG Multiplier increases over time by 10% per second, up to a maximum increase of 60%.

1.3.3.buffDesc:
• Increases Agent Electric Anomaly Buildup Rate and Ice Anomaly Buildup Rate by 25%.
• When inflicting an Attribute Anomaly on an enemy, increases all squad members' CRIT DMG by 20% and Attribute Anomaly DMG by 20%. Stacks up to three times and lasts for 30s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

1.4.1.buffDesc:
• Increases Agent Electric DMG and Ice DMG by 20%.
• When attacking an enemy in suffering an Attribute Anomaly, increases Agent's CRIT Rate by 20% and CRIT DMG by 40%.

1.4.2.buffDesc:
• Increases Agent Anomaly Buildup Rate by 25%.
• When a Support Agent uses an EX Special Attack, Chain Attack, or Ultimate, increases all squad members' ATK by 15% and Anomaly Proficiency by 20 for 20s, stacking up to 2 times. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

1.5.1.buffDesc:
• The Agent's CRIT DMG increases by 20%.
• Every time the Agent casts Quick Assist, all squad members' ATK increases by 10%, stacking up to 4 times and lasting 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

1.5.2.buffDesc:
• The Agent's Fire DMG and Ice DMG increase by 20%.
• Chain Attack DMG increases by 40%. With every trigger of Chain Attack, the Agent recovers 10 Energy.

1.5.3.buffDesc:
• The Agent's Impact increases by 15%.
• When the Agent's Chain Attack hits the enemy, DEF decreases by 25%, lasting 10s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

1.6.1.buffDesc:
• Agent Fire DMG and Electric DMG are increased by 20%.
• When an Agent hits an enemy with an Aftershock or Stuns an enemy, all squad members' CRIT Rate is increased by 15%, and CRIT DMG is increased by 30%, lasting for 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

1.6.2.buffDesc:
• Enemy Stun DMG Multiplier is increased by 30%.
• When an Agent's Aftershock hits an enemy, the enemy's Fire RES and Electric RES are reduced by 20%, lasting for 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

1.6.3.buffDesc:
• The damage dealt by Aftershocks and EX Special Attacks is increased by 25%, and Daze is increased by 15%.
• After the enemy is Stunned, their Stun recovery speed is reduced by 15%, and the Electric DMG and Ether DMG dealt by Agents is increased by 40%.

1.7.1.buffDesc:
• Agent Ether Anomaly Buildup Rate and Physical Anomaly Buildup Rate increases by 20%.
• After Stunning or inflicting an Attribute Anomaly on an enemy, the Agent generates 20 Energy. The Energy Generation effect can trigger once every 20s and all squad members' ATK increases by 20% for 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

1.7.2.buffDesc:
• EX Special Attack DMG increases by 40%.
• After Stunning or inflicting an Attribute Anomaly on an enemy, all squad members' Ether DMG and Ice DMG increase by 35% for 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

1.7.3.buffDesc:
• Agent ATK increases by 10%, and enemy Stun recovery speed is reduced by 10%. When inflicting an Attribute Anomaly on the enemy, if the enemy is not Stunned, 10% Daze will be directly accumulated.
• Agents with the Attack specialty deal 30% more damage to enemies with Ultimate and EX Special Attacks, and if the enemy is Stunned, the attack's CRIT DMG is further increased by 60%.

2.0.1.buffDesc:
• Agent Max HP increases by 15%, Ether DMG and Ice DMG increase by 20%.
• When an Agent activates Quick Assist or Ultimate, their Sheer DMG increases by 30%, CRIT DMG increases by 20%, lasting 20s, repeated triggers reset the duration.

2.0.2.buffDesc:
• Agent Sheer DMG increases by 20%, Energy and Adrenaline Generation Rate increase by 15%.
• When enemies are Stunned, the whole squad recovers 600 Decibels, and their Ether DMG and Fire DMG increase by 20% for 20s. The Decibel generation effect can trigger once every 20 seconds.

2.0.3.buffDesc:
• Agents' Daze dealt increases by 10%, Ultimate DMG increases by 30%.
• When enemies are Stunned, the whole squad's Sheer DMG increases by 15% and CRIT DMG increases by 20% for 25s, repeated triggers reset the duration.

2.1.1.buffDesc:
• Agent CRIT DMG increases by 20%, Anomaly Proficiency increases by 40 points.
• After an Agent with Support specialty uses their EX Special Attack or Aftershock, the whole squad's ATK increases by 20% and their Attribute Anomaly DMG increases by 30% for 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

2.1.2.buffDesc:
• Enemy Ether RES and Physical RES drop by 15%.
• After using EX Special Attack or Chain Attack, for Agents, Attribute Anomaly DMG increases by 15%, CRIT DMG increases by 20%, Sheer DMG increases by 20% for 20s. Repeated triggers refresh duration.

2.1.3.buffDesc:
• For Agents, Electric Anomaly Buildup Rate and Physical Anomaly Buildup Rate increase by 15%, while ATK increases by 15%.
• When hitting enemies affected by Attribute Anomaly, Agents ignore 15% of their DEF and deal 20% bonus DMG.

2.1.4.buffDesc:
• Agent Electric DMG and Physical DMG increase by 20%, while Anomaly Proficiency increases by 40.
• Upon hitting an enemy with a Basic Attack, EX Special Attack, or Ultimate, DMG dealt increases by 20% and CRIT DMG increases by 40%.

2.2.1.buffDesc:
• Electric DMG and Physical DMG from Agents increase by 30%. Their Attribute Anomaly DMG increases by 30%.
• When there are 1/2 Agents with Attack specialty in the squad, ATK increases by 10%/25% for all squad members.

2.2.2.buffDesc:
• When there are 1/2 Agents with Attack specialty in the squad, Agents ignore 10%/20% of all DMG RES when hitting enemies.
• After Aftershock hits, Agents' CRIT DMG increases by 60% for 10s. Repeated triggers refresh the duration.

2.2.3.buffDesc:
• Agents' Electric DMG and Fire DMG increase by 20%. Sheer DMG increases by 20%.
• When Aftershock or Ultimate hits enemies, Agents with Attack or Rupture specialty gain 50% CRIT DMG for 15 seconds. Repeated triggers refresh the duration.

2.3.1.buffDesc:
• Agent Max HP increases by 15%, Ether DMG and Electric DMG increase by 20%.
• When an Agent with Support specialty uses EX Special Attack, the whole squad's Sheer DMG increases by 20% and ATK increases by 20%, lasting 20s, repeated triggers reset the duration.

2.3.2.buffDesc:
• Agent Ice DMG and Ether DMG increase by 15%.
• While Agents are in an Ether Veil, CRIT DMG increases by 40% and Sheer DMG increases by 20%. These buffs are removed when exiting Ether Veil.

2.3.3.buffDesc:
• Stun specialty Agent Daze dealt increases by 15%.
• Agent Sheer DMG increases by 15%, and CRIT DMG increases by 50% when attacking Stunned enemies.

2.4.1.buffDesc:
• When an Agent with the Stun specialty hits a Stunned enemy, the enemy's Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 50%.
• Agent EX Special Attack and Ultimate DMG increase by 60%.

2.4.2.buffDesc:
• Agent Sheer DMG increases by 15%, Fire DMG and Ice DMG increase by 20%.
• When Agent Basic Attacks and EX Special Attacks land a critical hit on an enemy, own CRIT DMG increases by 5% for 5s, stacking up to 10 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

buffDesc:
• Agent ATK increases by 30%, CRIT DMG increases by 15%.
• Enemy Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 20%.

• Agent Electric DMG increases by 20%.
• Agent Basic Attack, Special Attack, and EX Special Attack deal 40% increased DMG and ignore 15% of enemy DEF.

• Agent Ice DMG increases by 20%, Basic Attack DMG increases by 40%.
• After an Agent uses an EX Special Attack, the Agent's Ice DMG additionally increases by 20% for 15s, repeated triggers reset the duration.
• Agent CRIT DMG increases by 15%. While in Ether Veil, Agent ATK increases by 25%, and attacks ignore 10% of enemy's DEF.

• Agent Electric DMG and Fire DMG increase by 30%, Anomaly Proficiency increases by 60.
• Agents start with 40 additional Energy, Attribute Anomaly DMG increases by 20%.

• Agent Sheer DMG increases by 10%, CRIT DMG increases by 25%.
• When an Agent's Ultimate hits enemies, ignores 10% of their All-DMG RES.

• While in Ether Veil, Agent ATK increases by 25% and CRIT DMG increases by 20%.
• When Agents hit enemies, they ignore 10% of enemy Physical RES.

• Agent Ice DMG and Physical DMG increase by 15%.
• When Agents inflict an Attribute Anomaly on enemies, their DEF is reduced by 10%, and they take 20% more Attribute Anomaly DMG for 10s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

• Agent Fire DMG increases by 20%.
• Agent Basic Attack and Chain Attack DMG increase by 40%, and CRIT DMG increases by 30%.

• Agent CRIT DMG increases by 20%.
• While in Ether Veil, Agent Physical DMG increases by 15%, and attacks ignore 10% of enemy's DEF.

• Agent Electric DMG increases by 15%.
• Agent Basic Attack, EX Special Attack, and Ultimate deal 20% increased DMG and ignore 10% of enemy All-DMG RES on hit.

• Agent Fire DMG increases by 20% and Agent ATK increases by 10%.
• The Agent gains an additional 40 initial Energy and deals 40% bonus CRIT DMG.

• While in Ether Veil, Agent ATK increases by 25% and CRIT DMG increases by 20%.
• When Agents hit enemies, they ignore 10% of enemy Physical RES.

• Agent Ice DMG increases by 20%, Basic Attack DMG increases by 40%.
• After an Agent uses an EX Special Attack, the Agent's Ice DMG additionally increases by 20% for 15s, repeated triggers reset the duration.

• Agent Max HP increases by 15%, Ether DMG and Ice DMG increase by 20%.
• When an Agent activates Ultimate, their Sheer DMG increases by 15% for 20s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

• Agent Physical DMG and Electric DMG increase by 15%, while their CRIT DMG increases by 20%.
• When an Agent with Attack specialty hits an enemy and crits, enemy DEF drops by 10% for 5s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

• Agent Sheer DMG increases by 10%.
• While in Ether Veil, Agent Sheer DMG further increases by 15%, and attacks ignore 15% of enemy All-DMG RES on hit.

• Agent Ether DMG increases by 20%.
• While in Ether Veil, Agent ATK increases by 30%, and attacks ignore 10% of enemy Ether RES.

• Agent ATK increases by 30%, CRIT DMG increases by 15%.
• Enemy Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 20%.

• Agent Ether DMG increases by 20%.
• After inflicting Attribute Anomaly on an enemy, the Agent restores 20 Energy and all squad members' ATK increases by 35% for 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. Energy boost CD: 20s.

• Agent Ice DMG and Ether DMG increase by 15%.
• While Agents are in an Ether Veil, CRIT DMG increases by 40% and Sheer DMG increases by 20%. These buffs are removed when exiting Ether Veil.

• Agent Physical DMG and Electric DMG increase by 15%, while their CRIT DMG increases by 20%.
• When an Agent with Attack specialty hits an enemy and crits, enemy DEF drops by 10% for 5s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

• Increases the Agent's Ether DMG by 20%.
• When an enemy enters the Stunned state, increases their Daze Vulnerability by 30% and increases Attribute Anomaly DMG taken by 20%.

• Agent Ice DMG and Fire DMG increases by 15%, Ultimate DMG increases by 30%.
• After an Agent uses an EX Special Attack, the Agent's Ice DMG and Fire DMG additionally increases by 15% for 15s, repeated triggers reset the duration.

• Agent Ether DMG increases by 20%.
• While in Ether Veil, Agent ATK increases by 30%, and attacks ignore 10% of enemy Ether RES.

• Agent Electric DMG increases by 20%.
• Agent Basic Attack, Special Attack, and EX Special Attack deal 40% increased DMG and ignore 15% of enemy DEF.

• Agent Max HP increases by 15%, Ether DMG and Ice DMG increase by 20%.
• When an Agent activates EX Special Attack, their Sheer DMG increases by 15% for 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

• Agents' Daze dealt increases by 10%, Ultimate DMG increases by 20%.
• When enemies are Stunned, the whole squad's CRIT DMG increases by 30% for 30s, repeated triggers reset the duration.

• When there are 1/2 Agents with Attack specialty in the squad, Agents ignore 5%/15% of all DMG RES when hitting enemies.
• After triggering a critical hit, the Agent's Electric DMG increases by 20% for 5s. Repeated triggers refresh the duration.

• Agent Ether Anomaly Buildup Rate and Ice Anomaly Buildup Rate increase by 25%.
• When Agents inflict an Attribute Anomaly on enemies, their DEF is reduced by 10%, and they take 20% more Attribute Anomaly DMG for 10s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
